About Me

Let me tell you about myself

Who is Steve Schaner?

Since 2008, I have been opening young minds to the world of math. I have gained valuable skills in leadership, accountability, time management, and the ability to help others achieve success.

I have a passion for learning and have always had a love for technology and helping my community. I have been learning web development through online courses to grow as an individual and to give back to my community. I have the self-determination and problem solving skills to achieve success. I believe there's nothing better than a self-made developer with the passion to learn and grow. Being a self-determined and easy going team member, I will become an invaluable member to your team.

Allendale Public Schools

Math Teacher
2014 - Present

Managed groups of students. Planned lessons to improve learning. Helped develop curriculum. Developed an online program, keeping track and motivating students to graduate.

Grand Rapids Public Schools

Math Teacher
2010 - 2014

Managed groups of students. Planned lessons to improve learning. Helped develop curriculum.

Benton Harbor Area Schools

Math Teacher
2008 - 2010

Managed groups of students. Planned lessons to improve learning. Helped develop curriculum.

What Do I Know?

I continually strive to improve myself in anything I do. Over the past few years, I have decided that I want to help local businesses by creating amazing looking and functional websites for them. I have taken and continue to take courses on Udemy to learn as much as I can about web development. I continue to learn and grow to create the best online experience.

I have gained these skills along the way

  • HTML5
  • CSS3 / Sass
  • JavaScript
  • Bootstrap
  • Node JS
  • React
  • Angular
  • SQL and NoSQL
  • MongoDB
